title: Bitcoin and S&P 500 Year-End Bull Run Loading? Vol Metrics Say Yes
contentSnippet: Implied volatility indices tied to bitcoin and the S&P 500 have erased the recent spike, offering bullish price signals.

title: UK takes ‘meaningful step forward’ with proposed DeFi tax overhaul
contentSnippet: The UK has proposed a “no gain, no loss” approach to decentralized finance transactions, scrapping capital gains taxes on deposits to crypto lending platforms.

title: Bitcoin set for ‘promising new year’ as it faces worst November in 7 years
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is down nearly 17% this month and is tracking toward its worst November since at least 2019, but LVRG’s Nick Ruck says that sets it up for a good 2026.

title: How the Fusaka upgrade fits into Ethereum’s long-term roadmap
contentSnippet: A clear look at how Ethereum’s Fusaka upgrade advances scaling, data efficiency and validator usability across the next phase of the roadmap.

title: ブータン政府が320ETHをステーキング、BTC保有と併せ仮想通貨準備金戦略を拡大
contentSnippet: ブータン政府はFigmentを通じて320ETH（約1.5億円）をステーキングした。世界初となる国民デジタルIDのイーサリアム統合、6,154BTC（876億円相当）の保有、観光業へのバイナンスペイ導入など、小国ながら先進的なブロックチェーン戦略を展開している。

title: South Korea Suspects North Korea-Linked Lazarus Behind $36M Upbit Hack
contentSnippet: On Thursday, South Korea's largest digital asset exchange, Upbit, suspended deposits and withdrawals after detecting unusual activity in the Solana network tokens.

title: Monad Token Extends Slide Amid Profit-Taking, Spoofed Transaction Concerns
contentSnippet: Monad’s token slipped on Thursday as possible profit-taking and a recent spoofing issue pressured prices despite brisk on-chain activity.

title: Solana Traders Hit by Months-Long Browser Malware That Skimmed Every Swap
contentSnippet: Wallet interfaces typically summarize instructions as a single swap, and the bundled transaction executes atomically—meaning users unknowingly sign off on both.

title: Crypto sentiment recovers to levels when Bitcoin last traded over $100K
contentSnippet: Despite Bitcoin remaining below $100,000, crypto sentiment is improving as the cryptocurrency has climbed above $90,000.

title: Upbit Hack Attributed to North Korea's Lazarus as Seoul Opens Probe: Report
contentSnippet: The breach has prompted a formal review of Upbit’s systems as regulators examine the Solana hot-wallet theft.

title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、押し目買いで70億円相当のイーサリアムを追加購入
contentSnippet: ビットマイン・イマージョンが27日、70億円相当のイーサリアムを追加購入した。これは同社の毎週の購入パターンと一致。先週まで保有するETHは363万枚を超え供給量の3%に到達。

title: DOGE Underperforms Majors as Support Failure Confirms Bearish Shift
contentSnippet: The $0.150 level is now a critical support point, with further declines likely if it is breached.

title: South Africa’s central bank says no ‘strong immediate need’ for CBDC
contentSnippet: The South African Reserve Bank found no short-term need for a retail CBDC, saying wholesale or cross-border uses should be explored instead.

title: 途上国インフレが仮想通貨の促進要因に　今年のチェイナリシス「グローバル仮想通貨採用指標」
contentSnippet: チェイナリシスの2025年仮想通貨採用指標でインドが首位に。各国でインフレがステーブルコインなど仮想通貨の需要を喚起している。日本はAPAC地域で最高成長率を記録した。

title: XRP Faces Downside Risk as Historical Patterns Point to $1.50
contentSnippet: XRP needs to reclaim $2.20 and break $2.23–$2.24 to regain upward momentum, as technical indicators remain bearish.

title: トム・リー氏、ビットコイン年末25万ドル予想を軟化　史上最高値更新は「可能性ある」
contentSnippet: ビットマインのトム·リー会長が年末25万ドルという強気予想を初めて軟化。10月に200万口座が消滅した史上最大の清算イベント後、年末10万ドル突破は「非常に可能性が高い」と予想を下方修正したが、楽観的な見方は維持している。

title: MegaETH’s $500M Pre-Deposit Turns Into a Full Rewind After Missteps Pile Up
contentSnippet: The issues began immediately at launch, when transactions failed because the contract contained an incorrect SaleUUID, requiring a 4-of-6 multisig update.

title: Switzerland delays crypto tax info sharing until 2027
contentSnippet: Switzerland will enshrine a global crypto tax sharing framework into law on Jan. 1, but will delay implementing it until at least 2027.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Decentralized exchange volumes soar on memecoin trading rush: CoinGecko
contentSnippet: In June, the DEX to CEX spot ratio hit an all-time peak of 37.4%, largely due to “a spike in PancakeSwap’s volumes,” says CoinGecko analyst Yuqian Lim.

title: 欧州最大級の資産運用会社アムンディ、イーサリアム上で初のトークン化ファンドを運用開始
contentSnippet: 欧州最大級の資産運用会社アムンディが、マネーマーケットファンドの初のトークン化シェアをイーサリアムブロックチェーン上で開始した。24時間365日の運用が可能になり、投資家は従来型とトークン化の両方でファンドにアクセスできる。

title: Visa、中東欧・中東・アフリカでステーブルコイン決済を拡大　Aquanowと提携
contentSnippet: 決済大手Visaが27日、Aquanowと提携し中東欧・中東・アフリカ地域でステーブルコイン決済を拡大すると発表。USDCを活用し、コスト削減と決済時間短縮を実現。世界のステーブルコイン市場は5年で10倍に成長。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Steadies Near $90,000 Even as ETF Outflows Cap Upside
contentSnippet: Flowdesk and QCP see short covering and dip buying supporting BTC around $90,000, while prediction markets assign low odds of a push toward $96,000.

title: USDT発行のテザー、ウルグアイのBTCマイニング施設を閉鎖　高コストで採算合わず
contentSnippet: ステーブルコインUSDT発行のテザー社がウルグアイでのBTCマイニング事業を停止した。電力コストが折り合わなかったことを理由としている。7月にはブラジルでの計画を発表していた。

title: ETH whales uneasy as onchain, derivatives data reduce chance for rally to $4K
contentSnippet: ETH investor sentiment wavers as onchain activity and bearish derivatives positioning leave whales unconvinced, reducing the odds for a rally to $4,000.

title: ヴィタリック、計1億円超相当のイーサリアムをプライバシー領域のプロジェクトに寄付
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムのヴィタリック・ブテリン氏は、プライバシー機能を持つメッセージアプリSessionとSimpleXにそれぞれ6000万円相当のETHを寄付した。期待する点を説明している。

title: Interpol Elevates Scam-Compound Network to Global Threat as Crypto Fraud Spreads
contentSnippet: The aim is to confront global scam center systems that traffic workers, run large-scale online fraud, and channel billions through crypto.

title: トランプ関連プロジェクトと提携のALT5シグマ、CEO解任　内部混乱が明らかに
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のALT5シグマが、トランプ前大統領の家族が支援するワールドリバティファイナンシャル（WLFI）との提携後、株価が80%下落し内部混乱に陥っている。CEOや複数の幹部が解任され、規制当局の調査やルワンダでのマネーロンダリング有罪判決も明らかになった。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: ネイバーとアップビット親会社ドゥナム、AIとブロックチェーン融合で1兆円投資へ
contentSnippet: ネイバーとアップビット運営のドゥナムが、AIとブロックチェーンを組み合わせた次世代金融インフラ構築に向け、今後5年間で1兆円超を投資する計画を発表した。韓国ウォン連動型ステーブルコイン発行も視野に入れている。

title: Balancer DAO Starts Discussing $8M Recovery Plan After $110M Exploit Cut TVL by Two-Thirds
contentSnippet: The recovered tokens, spanning multiple networks and assets, will be paid out in the same tokens as originally provided, with a claim mechanism being developed.

title: Toncoin Lags Broader Crypto Rebound as Derivatives Data Shows Cautious Optimism
contentSnippet: Altcoin funding rates, including for TON, have turned positive, indicating renewed confidence among traders, but overall market participation remains muted.

title: Trump Family-Linked Alt5 Sigma Ousts Top Execs After CEO Suspension Shakes Up Leadership
contentSnippet: The company is on its third CEO in six weeks, with Tony Isaac appointed as Acting CEO, and has named Steven Plumb as its new CFO.

title: Malware Chrome Extension Secretly Siphoned Fees From Solana Traders for Months
contentSnippet: Cybersecurity firm Socket warns the extension masks a second transaction instruction that quietly skims SOL from routine swaps.

title: Vitalik Buterin Donates $765K in Ethereum to Privacy Messaging Apps
contentSnippet: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin supported two privacy messaging apps that are looking to break past sector leaders Signal and Telegram.

title: US AI and Data Firms to Testify in Chinese AI Espionage Probe
contentSnippet: The U.S. is probing how Chinese operators used AI in a cyber-espionage campaign as experts warn similar tools could hit on-chain finance.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Spot Solana ETFs Post First Red Day Since Launch
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs recorded their first-ever outflow of $8.1M amid a broader crypto market recovery, breaking a three-week streak of inflows.

title: Bonk Teams Up With Bitcoin Capital to Launch ETP in Europe
contentSnippet: Investors can now trade Solana meme coin BONK as a regulated product on Switzerland's largest stock exchange.

title: 'Improving Risk Sentiment' Driving Bitcoin's $90K Retest: QCP
contentSnippet: Analysts remain cautiously optimistic, with Bitcoin reclaiming $90K as the chances of a December rate cut hit 85%.
